## Who Am I?

My name is Ismael Ramzi Mousa, born on July 19, 2003, in Nablus/Palestine. I'm a student specializing in AI and Data
Science, with nearly two years of software development experience. I'm a self-motivated learner with a keen eye for
detail and enjoy working in team settings where I can both share my knowledge and learn from others. In my personal
time, I focus on enhancing my Machine Learning skills.

---
